contentList.content: A battle-ready fighter with no equal in combat.
An explorer most at home on the fringes of the realm.
A skillful rogue that gets by on stealth and guile.

Jedi Guardians battle against the forces of evil and the dark side. They focus on combat training and masterful use of the lightsaber. Jedi Guardians gain the Force Jump feat automatically. This feat allows them to instantly close the distance and attack an opponent within 10 metres.

Jedi Sentinels ferret out deceit and injustice, bringing them to light. They strike a balance between the physical and mental disciplines of the Jedi Order. Jedi Sentinels gain the Jedi Immunity feat automatically. This makes them immune to fear.

Jedi Consulars seek to bring balance to the universe. They focus less on physical combat and more on mental disciplines in order to augment their mastery of the Force. Jedi Consulars gain the Force Focus feat automatically. This feat makes it harder for opponents to resist their Force Powers.
This feature allows a character to wear Light armor. Characters without this feature CANNOT wear Light or heaver armor without disadvantage penalties.

Prerequisites: Armor Proficiency: Light
This feature allows a character to wear Medium armor. Characters without this feature CANNOT wear Medium or heaver armor without disadvantage penalties.

Prerequisites: Armor Proficiency: Medium
This feature allows a character to wear Heavy armor. Characters without this feature CANNOT wear Heavy armor without disadvantage penalties.
This feature gives a character basic training in the use of one-handed ranged weapon types.
This feature gives a character basic training in the use of light ranged weapon types.
This feature gives a character basic training in the use of heavy ranged weapon types.
This feature gives a character basic training in the use of simple hand-to-hand melee weapon types.
This feature gives a character basic training in the use of specialized hand-to-hand melee weapon types.

Prerequisites: Jedi
This feature gives a character basic training in the use of lightsabers.
This feature gives a character basic training in the use of grenades and thrown weapon types.

Prerequisites: Weapon Proficiency: Small ranged weapons
Adds a +1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> bonus with one-handed ranged weapons.

Prerequisites: Weapon Proficiency: Medium ranged weapons
Adds a +1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> bonus with light ranged weapons.

Prerequisites: Weapon Proficiency: Heavy ranged weapons
Adds a +1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> bonus with heavy ranged weapons.

Prerequisites: Weapon Proficiency: Simple Melee weapons
Adds a +1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> bonus with simple melee weapons.

Prerequisites: Weapon Proficiency: Martial Melee weapons
Adds a +1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> bonus with martial melee weapons.

Prerequisites: Jedi, Weapon Proficiency: Lightsabers
Adds a +1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> bonus with lightsabers.

Prerequisites: Weapon Proficiency: Thrown weapons
Adds a +1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> bonus with grenades and thrown weapons.

Prerequisites: Level 4 Soldier, Weapon Focus: Small ranged weapons
Adds a +2 damage bonus with one-handed ranged weapons.

Prerequisites: Level 4 Soldier, Weapon Focus: Medium ranged weapons
Adds a +2 damage bonus with light ranged weapons.

Prerequisites: Level 4 Soldier, Weapon Focus: Heavy ranged weapons
Adds a +2 damage bonus with heavy ranged weapons.

Prerequisites: Level 4 Soldier, Weapon Focus: Simple Melee weapons
Adds a +2 damage bonus with simple melee weapons.

Prerequisites: Level 4 Soldier, Weapon Focus: Martial Melee weapons
Adds a +2 damage bonus with martial melee weapons.

Prerequisites: Jedi Guardian, Weapon Focus: Lightsabers
Adds a +2 damage bonus with lightsabers.

Prerequisites: Level 4 Soldier, Weapon Focus: Thrown weapons
Adds a +2 damage bonus with grenades and thrown weapons.

This feature doubles the <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Threat range</LSTag> of attacks for the turn. If the attack hits, the target is also <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for 1 Turn unless they succeed a Constitution Save. This feature lowers the attacker's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> by -5 when used.

Prerequisites: Level 4, Critical Strike
This feature triples the <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Threat range</LSTag> of attacks for the turn. If the attack hits, the target is also <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for 1 Turn unless they succeed a Constitution Save. This feature lowers the attacker's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> by -5 when used.

Prerequisites: Level 8, Improved Critical Strike
This feature quadruples the <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Threat range</LSTag> of attacks for the turn. If the attack hits, the target is also <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for 1 Turn unless they succeed a Constitution Save. This feature lowers the attacker's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> by -5 when used.

This feature has the character make an extra melee attack. Character suffers -4 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> penalty for the next attack made against them. They also suffer a -4 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty to all attacks for the turn.

Prerequisites: Level 4, Flurry
This feature has the character make an extra melee attack. Character suffers -2 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> penalty for the next attack made against them. They also suffer a -2 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty to all attacks for the turn.

Prerequisites: Level 8, Improved Flurry
This feature has the character make an extra melee attack. Character suffers -1 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> penalty for the next attack made against them. They also suffer a -1 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty to all attacks for the turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty and damage bonus affect every attack in the turn.

Increases the <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Threat range</LSTag> of attacks for the turn.
Character suffers <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> penalty for the next attack made against them.
Upon sucsessful hit the target is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for one Turn.

Allows a character to make an extra ranged weapon attack during the round.
Character suffers <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> penalty for the next attack made against them.
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty affects every attack in the turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty and damage bonus affect every attack in the turn.

Adds points of extra damage to attacks when the target can't respond to the attacker. The extra damage is applied to attacks made from behind the target, attacks against stunned or otherwise immobilized targets, and any attacks made while in Stealth Mode.
Sneak Attack only works if the target is within 10 meters. The extra damage is not multiplied in the case of a critical hit.
This feature gives a +1 skill point bonus to both Investigation and Stealth.

Prerequisites: Level 4, Caution
This feature gives a +1 skill point bonus to both Investigation and Stealth. This adds onto the +1 bonus given by Caution.

Prerequisites: Level 8, Improved Caution
This feature gives a +1 skill point bonus to both Investigation and Stealth. This adds onto the +1 bonus given by Caution and Improved Caution.

Bonuses apply when characters focus on using single one-handed weapons in battle due to the efficiency of this form of combat. This applies to both ranged and melee weapons, but it does not apply when unarmed.
This feature gives a +1 skill point bonus to Persuasion, Perception, and Medicine.

Prerequisites: Level 4, Empathy
This feature gives a +1 skill point bonus to Persuasion, Perception, and Medicine.

Prerequisites: Level 8, Improved Empathy
This feature gives a +1 skill point bonus to Persuasion, Perception, and Medicine.
Skill bonus to Nature, Insight, and Arcana.
Hit Point bonus is retroactive for levels previously gained.
This Feature reduces the attack penalty of a character wielding two weapons (one in each hand).

Prerequisites: Level 4
This Feature further reduces the attack penalty of a character wielding two weapons (one in each hand).

Prerequisites: Level 8
This Feature again reduces the attack penalty of a character wielding two weapons (one in each hand).
Scoundrels have a knack for getting in trouble, but to compensate, they also possess an incredible instinct for survival.
Reduces Difficulty Class of incoming attacks.
Adds to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against the character's Force powers.
Allows a character to deflect ranged attacks at any time.
The Jedi develops a connection to the Force that allows them to better sense incoming attacks.

The Jedi knows that if diplomacy fails, combat must be swift and decisive. When an opponent at range is targeted with a standard lightsaber melee attack, this feat allows Guardians to make a quick series of jumps and rolls to close distance almost instantly. This feat is automatic when wielding a lightsaber and targeting opponents with a standard melee attack from more than 10 meters away. The Jedi must have a clear line of sight to the opponent.

Affect and Dominate Mind enable persuasive use of the Force. Once a Jedi has this power, extra options will appear in conversations as appropriate. Success is not guaranteed for extreme commands or if the target is strong willed. Dominate Mind is more powerful than Affect Mind, and very few beings can resist its effects.
For the duration of the effect (6 turns), movement speed is doubled.
This power absorbs half the points of damage from thunder, fire, cold and lightning attacks. This effect lasts for 20 turns.
This power absorbs half the points of damage from thunder, fire, cold, lightning and force attacks along with granting immunity to poison. This effect lasts for 20 turns.

An opponent targeted by Force Push is pushed back 5 meters, thrown to the ground stunned, and suffers damage. A successful Dexterity save means the target is not stunned, but still suffers half damage and gets thrown.

Force Whirlwind encircles the target victim in a small maelstrom of air and dust, inflicting damage and rendering them unable to take any action. A successful Dexterity save negates the damage and immobilizing effects altogether. Those adjacent to the target are pushed back 5 meters and thrown to the ground (but not stunned or damaged) unless a successful Dexterity save is made.

Force Wave creates a telekinetic explosion around the Jedi. All enemies within 15 meters are thrown 5 meters, fall to the ground and are incapacitated, and take damage. A successful Dexterity save means an enemy is not stunned, but still suffers half damage (and is thrown 5 meters).
This power offers some protection from direct Force power attacks of Jedi opponents, possibly negating their effects. This effect lasts for 10 turns.
This ability will cancel buffs up to spell level 2 active on the target. These buffs are instantly cancelled, but the target can reactivate them if capable.
This ability will cancel all buffs active on the target. These buffs are instantly cancelled, but the target can reactivate them if capable.
The target must be at least 5 meters away. This attack always hits. Once the weapon is thrown, it will automatically return to the Jedi's hand at the end of the round.

The target must be at least 5 meters away, and any additional targets must be within 5 meters of the previous. This attack always hits. Once the weapon is thrown, it will automatically return to the Jedi's hand at the end of the round.
This power heals all party members within a 15 meter radius.
When this power is activated, the Jedi is temporarily granted a bonus to AC and all saving throws. The effect lasts for 3 turns.
This power increases the physical attributes and saving throws of the Jedi and all party members. The effect lasts for 3 turns.
This power increases the physical attributes and saving throws of the Jedi and all party members along with granting immunity to poison. The effect lasts for 3 turns.

A successful Constitution save means the target is slowed for the duration instead of stunned.
When slowed, -4 AC is inflicted as well as the movement speed penalty: both effects stack (although duration does not), which can even result in negative Defense for the target(s).
This power renders constructs immobile for 2 turns. The construct also takes damage. A successful save by the target negates the stun and reduces damage by half.
This power allows the Jedi to drain the life of others to heal him or herself. A successful Constitution save reduces damage by half.
This power causes enemies to cower in fear of the attacking Jedi unless they make a Wisdom save.
This power unleashes an electrical attack. A successful Wisdom save by the target reduces damage by half.
Slow clouds the mind, making a target's actions unusually sluggish. A successful save negates these effects.
Affliction causes a target to suffer as though poisoned. The target is also slowed for the duration. A successful save negates these effects.
Plague causes a target to suffer as though deathly ill from poison. The target is also slowed for the duration. A successful save negates these effects.
Wound triggers spasms in the victim's lungs, causing great pain. A successful Constitution save results in no effect.

Choke constricts the throat of a target at range, stunning and also suffering a temporary (4 turn) -4 penalty to Constitution, Dexterity and Strength. A successful Constitution save results in no effect.

Kill allows the Jedi to exterminate an enemy at range with a single thought, causing the target to choke for 6 seconds and inflicting damage equal to (close to) half the target's maximum Hit Points. If the target makes a Constitution save they are not choked, but instead suffer damage equal to attacker's Wisdom modifier.
Used for casting Light and Universal Force Powers
Used for casting Dark and Universal Force Powers
